name: SleepingSoundsAmbient,SpaAndWhiteNoise
0:
”Alexa, open peaceful sounds”
”Alexa, ask peaceful sounds to play forest”
”Play the audio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peaceful sounds
des:
With nearly 1/3rd of the American population suffering from sleep deprivation, lack of focus and living in a fast and busy city life has made everything hectic with no time to relax.
This skill will help you gain better concentration, as well as rejuvenate the soul, mind, and body. 
These sounds are played in a way that they will help you lighten your brain and help you sleep better or even help you in focusing on more significant tasks. Some of the sounds are composed by sleep the therapists and psychiatrists.
So, just try them out and if you like what you listen, make sure to leave a review and a rating. 

Currently, there are 15 different sounds:
to begin the playlist just say "Alexa, open peaceful sounds"
Or to open a particular sound, say "Alexa, ask peaceful sounds to play (Name of the sound)"

Names of the sounds are:
1. Airplane 
2. Cricket 
3. Forest 
4. Beach 
5. Vacuum 
6. Texture 
7. Brown 
8. Spa 
9. Windy Leaves 
10. Snow Storm 
11. Shower 
12. Dishwasher 
13. Cave 
14. Fountains 
15. Washing Machine

Also, try the other similar skills

Sleeping Sounds: Relax, Study or Meditate
https://www.amazon.com/Sleeping-Sounds-Relax-Study-Meditate/dp/B0795B4MG1

& 

Relaxing Sounds: Sleep, Study or Meditate
https://www.amazon.com/Relaxing-Sounds-Sleep-Study-Meditate/dp/B079RKZSCC

Try them out!
Make a request for more relaxing sounds at apooos3@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
